Package javax.lang.posit

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bit
    Utility methods for bit manipulations.
    BitTest
    General test of this class.
    Demo
    Runs a Posit demo from the command line.
    Posit
    An implementation of Posit numbers for Java.
    PositDomain
    Encodes forumulas and information from Posit papers.
    PositDomainTest
    General test of this class.
    PositImmutable
    Posit elements that are immutable or generally not changed.
    PositImmutable.KeyPair
    Defines a pair of keys (based on bits and maxExponentSize) that uniquely identify PositImmutable characteristics.
    PositImmutableTest
    General tests of this class.
    PositStringImpl
    Posit implementation based on String
    PositTest
    General test of this class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PositEnum
    A utility enum to describe components of a Posit number.
